GSD.description:
dmaengine: tegra: Add terminate() for Tegra234

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 32a979841d790271afdca6f198b348dbdffc172a. For more details please see the references link.
